Class FileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileReader
  • public class FileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to construct string representation of shapes from array elements, open files and save files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileReader()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Shape createShape​(java.lang.String shapeType, java.lang.String command)
      Instantiates a new shape depending on the shape type.
      static void open​(java.lang.String path)
      Opens the selected VEC formatted file and loads the commands stored within the file.
      static void save​(java.lang.String SaveLocation)
      Saves the current canvas and drawing data as a VEC formatted file.
      static java.lang.String stringExtractor​(java.lang.String[] Array)
      Extract each element from the input array and save them as a string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • stringExtractor

        public static java.lang.String stringExtractor​(java.lang.String[] Array)
        Extract each element from the input array and save them as a string.
        Parameters:
        Array - The array of elements to be extracted and saved as a string.
        Returns:
        The string constructed from the elements of the input array.

      • open

        public static void open​(java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Opens the selected VEC formatted file and loads the commands stored within the file.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the file to be opened.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception on failure to open file.

      • createShape

        public static Shape createShape​(java.lang.String shapeType,
                                java.lang.String command)
                         throws ShapeException
        Instantiates a new shape depending on the shape type.
        Parameters:
        shapeType - A string representing the type of shape command to create.
        command - A string representing the coordinates for the shape command.
        Returns:
        The shape created.
        Throws:
        ShapeException - Throws a shape extension if shape command instantiation fails.

      • save

        public static void save​(java.lang.String SaveLocation)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves the current canvas and drawing data as a VEC formatted file.
        Parameters:
        SaveLocation - The path to the save location of the file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
